name: Chilly Noire
description: Brewed with just barley, rice, and black malt extract for a crisp and dry beer with a smooth and subdued roast character. Simcoe, Sultana, and Chinook hops give it a nice resinous, piney, and fruity kick complimented by the subtle esters from Kölsch yeast.
tasting: Resinous, piney, & fruity w/ a smooth & subdued roast character
